Text:
3 hours and 40 minutes, and only 64.5% complete????


Why is TvTeam and Scenebalance so lame lately?

You guys used to rival eztv, now all you do is frustrate your fans.

Seriously?  You guys used to be one of the elite.

Lately, something went to shit.

and I mean that in a constructive criticism way...  

Something's wrong, you guys used to be fast, reliable and solid.

now... not so much.
